snippet: One of the world’s leading experts on financial crises, Professor Reinhart is taking a new post.
abstract: One of the world’s leading experts on financial crises, Professor Reinhart is taking a new post.
lead_paragraph: Carmen Reinhart, one of the world’s top economic experts on financial crises, has been appointed to the Harvard Kennedy School of Government as the Minos A. Zombanakis Professor of the International Financial System. By citations, she is (by a long shot) the most influential female economist in the world.

headline.main: Carmen Reinhart to Harvard Kennedy School
